publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5956 Karen Whitefield: Congratulations to Dykehead Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates Dykehead Primary School in Shotts for achieving a very good HM Inspectorate of Education (HMIE) report; notes that the primary school received five very good ratings; further notes the particular strengths of the school identified by HMIE, including confident, polite and friendly children who are motivated learners and work well together, high quality care provided by staff, children’s knowledge about health and wellbeing and their achievements in learning to speak, read and write in French and the vision and leadership of the headteacher and principal teacher, and wishes the pupils and staff continued success in the future. Supported by: Des McNulty*, James Kelly*, Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Mitchell*, Aileen Campbell*, Michael McMahon*, Elaine Smith*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-5956Congratulations to Dykehead Primary School (lodged on 15 March 2010) Hugh Henry*
